part.content: CHAPTER II: THE REGISTER AND CONDITIONS FOR REGISTRATION. Sec. 3 - 17.
CHAPTER III: PROCEDURE FOR AND DURATION OF REGISTRATION. Sec. 18 - 26.
CHAPTER IV: EFFECT OF REGISTRATION. Sec. 27 - 36.
CHAPTER V: ASSIGNMENT AND TRANSMISSION. Sec. 37 - 45.
CHAPTER VI: USE OF TRADE MARK AND REGISTERED USERS. Sec. 46 - 56.
CHAPTER VII: RECTIFICATION AND CORRECTION OF THE REGISTER. Sec. 57 - 60.
CHAPTER IX: CERTIFICATION TRADE MARKS. Sec. 69 - 78.
CHAPTER X: SPECIAL PROVISIONS FOR TEXTILE GOODS. Sec. 79 - 82.
CHAPTER XII: OFFENCES, PENALTIES AND PROCEDURE. Sec. 101 - 121.
